scripts.build-browser: ./node_modules/browserbuild/bin/browserbuild -m from-data-view -g parseSWT -b lib/ lib/from-data-view.js lib/structure.json > browser/swtparser.js
scripts.test: npm run standard && npm run test-parser
scripts.fake-tests: node bin/swtparser.js < test/SWT/SwissIndividual.SWT > test/JSON/SwissIndividual.json && node bin/swtparser.js < test/SWT/SwissTeam.SWT > test/JSON/SwissTeam.json
